name: Gravitation Testimonials
author: Ulises Freitas

sections.description:
Gravitation Testimonials, is a plugin to display testimonials on your site, with ShortCodes

A brief Markdown Example

Features ShortCodes:

  1. All Testimonials [gravitation_testimonials]
  2. Testimonials ids [gravitation_testimonials ids=”1,2,3,5″]
  3. Testimonials ids [gravitation_testimonials ids=”1,2,3,5″ category=”customers”]
  4. Testimonials ids [gravitation_testimonials count=”3″]
  5. Testimonials ids [gravitation_testimonials count=”3″ category=”customers”]
  6. Testimonials ids [gravitation_testimonials category=”customers”]
sections.installation:
Download and install from WordPress.org.
Configure as you see fit, under Gravitation / Gravitation Testimonials.
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
1. Place [gravitaiton_testimonials] in your templates
sections.faq: -Because is based on how much post you decide to show on your reading settings and in this case you have “Show post = 2”
